name: Allen L Johnson Jr
body:
## Summary
Allen is a creative and innovative web developer with extensive experience in creating, developing and maintaining web content and web communications, email marketing, search engine optimization, graphics development, flash e-learning and social media. Excellent writer and communicator. Team player.

Allen has extensive experience developing interactive e-learning applications, web applications, micro-sites and corporate web sites using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and JQuery, XML, PHP/MySQL., SQL queries, Flash (AS2,AS3), Photoshop, AJAX applications. CMS experience with WordPress and Drupal, Bootstrap framework.

Specialties: 

* web standards based coding using HTML5, CSS3
* on-line marketing, search engine optimization by using proper validated semantic code 
* back-end programming knowledge with PHP/MySQL, basic experience of OOP principles 
* CMS design and maintenance using Drupal, and WordPress
* Interactive design with JavasScript and JQuery 
* Responsive Web Design (RWD)
* Knowledge of designing with accessibility in mind (contrast, ARIA, title and alt tags)
* digital strategy (social media, SEO,SEM)
* Experience working in an Agile environment with Scrums, Sprints, Jira tracking

## Web Development /Design Projects 

http://www.reggieparkerphotography.com/
Created a series of "Photo Galleries" for Photography web site so that photographer can "drag and drop" images into ftp folder for quick display of event images to clients. Client requested a revamp of current site to include a 'Wedding Gallery", "Ceremony Gallery", "Commercial, "Couples", and "Details".  Customer wants a different "home page gallery" to display (random order) each time the page is loaded.   


www.dekalbyouthleadershipacademy.com
Web design and development of a fully functional multi media website using Flash, Dreamweaver, Photoshop, Final Cut, Premiere Pro Illustrator,  After Effects, Avid, Premiere Pro, Illustrator, Final Cut, etc 
     *Create, edit, convert video for optimized use to load quickly across multiple browsers. 
     *Story-boarding, 3D design/animation
     *Design applied to motion graphics, video and multimedia using Adobe Suite
     *Video and audio editing (Timeline editing)
     *Utilization of latest graphic design software and tools, practices and procedures 
     *Create completely dynamic site for ease of updating and loading of external files / documents to ensure minimum modifications to main site. 


https://web.archive.org/web/20121123150936/http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/chambleehs
**Project Request:**  Create a website that had the capabilities to be updated often and quickly by a non-technical employees. Site should be visually appealing to audience while maintaining security according to State web site standards. 

**Solution:**  Using Action Script, create a fully dynamic flash site so that all navigation, text, images, and sound would load from external locations on local server.  Server-side scripts (PHP) allow security of selected files and user authentication using mySql.  Updating of site text, images, external .fla files, and sound took place through by parsing a single text file and read into flash containers using Action Script 3.
